subject: AI & Agents
title: Depth Estimation from Single Images
description: A fast breakdown of Depth Estimation from Single Images for builders.

hook.text: One photo. No stereo cameras. The model estimates how far away everything is.

buildup.text: Monocular depth estimation predicts a depth map from a single 2D image.

discovery.text: Models learn depth cues: relative size, occlusion, texture gradients, and perspective.

climax.text: DepthAnything and MiDaS produce usable depth maps for AR, robotics, and 3D reconstruction.
